text:
Between KJE and Bangkit groups of HDB's

It was recently renovated in Dec 2024 peoplr dont prrfer this place as the playground attracts insects and snakes during wet climate. Though i like this place i dont recommend because of above reason.
Rest assured kids woulf love to play here.

Compact yet engaging adventure space perfect for kids. Despite its size, it cleverly incorporates various obstacles, play areas, and climb structures that keep children entertained and happily engaged, allowing them to burn off their boundless energy. Maintained diligently by NParks, the sandy pit surface adds a natural touch and is consistently mosquito-free, safe and enjoyable play environment for kids. For accompanying adults, there are convenient sitting areas available, providing a comfortable spot to supervise while the little ones explore and play. Well-designed and maintained playground, great place!

A quiet, sandy and shady children's playground along the PCN of Zhenghua Park.

Fairly spacious, for kids' sand play or trying out the slides and other climbing features.

Went on a Sat morning. The weather was great, with a few other families and their kids enjoying the playground.
Hard to find a raw forest in Singapore.  There are monkeys, wild boars and even deers...lol.
Very nice sand playground for kids to have some fun.
